main.name: Eric Ho
main.bio: Im am an aspiring engineer, with a background in computer science, and a passion for innovation. I favor creative projects that push me to invent, deconstruct, and reimagine. Outside of work I am a gym rat, musician, skateboarder, and traveler. My professional career is just getting started, and I am excited for the journy to come.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: BS in Computer Science, Minor in Economics
education.description: In my time at UF, I learned a lot of theory in courses such as operating systems, data structures and algorithms, and numerical analysis. In other courses, I completed many projects that challenged my logical reasoning, teamwork, and programming skills. Some notable projects include a VST plugin that simulated 3D audio, A web application for an ecommmerce store owner, and a titanic survival prediction model.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
